title: Palindrome Permutations
description: Given a string, write a function to check if it is a permutation of a palindrome. The palindrome does not need to be limited to just dictionary words (skip non-letter characters). Your solution should be case insensitive.

return.comment: Indicate if string is a permutation of palindrome

parameters.name: phrase
parameters.comment: string to be checked if any permutation is palindrome
